channel.title: [317] Player clipping
channel.description:
Base: Delta
How do I implement player clipping? If player clipping is in my source already, what are the method's? What are known method's for player clipping? I've got npc clipping working (finally). But as far as player clipping, when following a player-he walks through objects, when lighting a fire-he walks through objects. How do I prevent it?
